name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
description: Classic Italian garlic and oil pasta - simple, fast, and delicious

steps.name: Boil Water
steps.description: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil

steps.name: Prepare Garlic
steps.description: Mince the garlic cloves and slice the chili pepper

steps.name: Cook Pasta
steps.description: Add spaghetti to boiling water and cook until al dente (about 9 minutes)

steps.name: Infuse Oil
steps.description: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and chili pepper, cook until fragrant (about 3 minutes)

steps.name: Combine
steps.description: Drain pasta (reserve 1 cup pasta water), add to oil pan with garlic

steps.name: Finish
steps.description: Toss pasta with oil, add pasta water as needed. Season with salt and pepper

steps.name: Serve
steps.description: Plate pasta, garnish with fresh parsley and more pepper
